alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:34PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Russell County through 900 PM CST... At 834 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Russell County Sports Complex, or 11 miles southwest of Phenix City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Ladonia, Russell County Sports Complex, Seale, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Ladonia Sports Complex, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Phenix Drag Strip and Parkmanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
